
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
# Load and filter
df=read.csv("UsingCFDValues.csv", sep=",")
df = df %>% na.omit()
```


```{r}
# Plot Convergence

ggplot(df, aes(x=Mesh.Nodes, y=Max.Deformation, label=Mesh.size..mm.)) + geom_point() + geom_line(aes(color=Mesh.Type)) + geom_text(vjust=1, hjust=1) + ggtitle("Mesh convergence Plot using values from CFD solver (labels=mesh size)")


```
